solution_line_template: Jack took {jack_took_more} more candies than the half, and Paul took the rest, which means {paul_took_remaining} + {jack_took_more} = {half_total_candies} candies were half of all candies.
That means at first there were {half_total_candies} * {multiplier_for_total} = <<{half_total_candies}*{multiplier_for_total}={initial_sweets}>>{initial_sweets} candies.
